rules.name: No_Location_Selected
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3) OR (4 AND 5 AND 6) OR (7 AND 8 AND 9)
rules.label: No Location Selected

rules.name: No_Location_Selected_2_0
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3) OR (4 AND 5 AND 6) OR (7 AND 8 AND 9)
rules.label: No Location Selected 2

validationRule.errorMessage: This field is required.

validationRule.errorMessage: This field is required.

fields.name: CopyrightCheckbox

validationRule.errorMessage: This field is required.

fields.name: DeadlinePassedText
fields.fieldText: You cannot edit this abstract anymore.

fields.name: ErrorTextPublic
fields.fieldText: Please enter less than 250 words.

fields.name: ErrorTextInvited
fields.fieldText: Please enter less than 250 words.

fields.name: NoImagesAddedText_0
fields.fieldText:
You have not added any images to your abstract.

Click Previous to add images.

Click Next to continue. You can also add images later.

fields.name: EditImagesText_0_0
fields.fieldText: Below you can see the images you have added to your abstract.

fields.name: UpdateSuccessMessage
fields.fieldText: Your abstract has been updated!

value.stringValue: Do you want to submit this abstract now?
Yes, I want to submit my abstract now
No, I want to save this draft and submit it later

fields.name: DraftSucacessDisplay
fields.fieldText:
Your draft has been saved.

All abstracts drafts can be seen and edited in the community.


Please remember to submit your abstract before the deadline {!Get_Event.Abstract_Submission_Deadline__c}

fields.name: SubmissionSuccessDisplay
fields.fieldText:
Thank you for your abstract submission!

You can see the status of your submitted abstract in the community.

fields.name: EditImagesText
fields.fieldText:
Below you can see the images you have added to your abstract.

You have the option to adjust where they should be located in the abstract.

You can also remove pictures, if needed.

fields.name: NoImagesAddedText
fields.fieldText:
You have not added any images to your abstract.

Click Previous to add images.

Click Next to continue. You can also add images later.

fields.name: FileErrorText
fields.fieldText: Please select a section for all files you uploaded.

fields.name: EditImagesText_0
fields.fieldText:
Below you can see the images you have added to your abstract.

You have the option to adjust where they should be located in the abstract.

You can also replace or add pictures by uploading a new picture.

fields.name: FileErrorText_0
fields.fieldText: Please select a section for all files you uploaded.
